snippet: Federal prosecutors in Brazil said Thursday that they were opening a full investigation into claims of influence peddling by Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva.
abstract: Brazil will investigate former Pres Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva for corruption allegations involving construction giant Odebrecht.
lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors in Brazil said Thursday that they were opening a full investigation into claims of influence peddling by Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva.

headline.main: Brazil Adds to Tally of Corruption Scandals With Investigation of a Former President
headline.print_headline: Brazil Adds to Tally of Corruption Scandals With Investigation of a Former President
